avalancheActivity.highlights: Avalanche prone locations are to be found above approximately 2300 m.
avalancheActivity.comment: On Tuesday the wind slabs have increased in size moderately. These are lying on weak layers in particular on very steep shady slopes. The fresh wind slabs can be released, even by small loads in isolated cases. They must be evaluated with care and prudence. The avalanche prone locations for dry avalanches are to be found in areas where the snow cover is rather shallow and at transitions into gullies and bowls. The avalanches can be triggered in the faceted old snow and reach medium size.

snowpackStructure.comment:
2 to 10 cm of snow fell on Tuesday above approximately 1200 m. Weak layers exist in the old snowpack on shady slopes. The snowpack is unfavourably layered and has a loosely bonded surface.

As a consequence of rising temperatures and solar radiation a crust formed on the surface at the weekend. At intermediate and high altitudes snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind. The numerous rocks hidden by the recent snow are the main danger.

tendency.highlights: On Friday it will be mostly sunny.

avalancheActivity.highlights: In all altitude zones thus far only a little snow is lying.
avalancheActivity.comment:
The new snow and wind slabs of Tuesday are lying on the unfavourable surface of an old snowpack on steep shady slopes above approximately 2600 m. The avalanches in these loacations are rather small and can be released in isolated cases by a single winter sport participant. Restraint should be exercised because avalanches can sweep people along and give rise to falls.
Some mostly small moist snow slides and avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming during the day and solar radiation. This applies in particular on extremely steep sunny slopes at intermediate and high altitudes.

snowpackStructure.comment:
15 to 25 cm of snow, and even more in some localities, fell on Tuesday above approximately 1200 m. In all altitude zones from a snow sport perspective, insufficient snow is lying. The numerous rocks hidden by the recent snow are the main danger. Large-grained weak layers exist in the bottom section of the snowpack on shady slopes.
At high altitudes and in high Alpine regions snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind.

tendency.highlights: On Friday it will be mostly sunny.

regions.name: B - VALLI DI GRESSONEY, AYAS, CHAMPORCHER

avalancheActivity.highlights: In all aspects a little snow is lying.
avalancheActivity.comment:
As a consequence of new snow and a moderate southerly wind, small wind slabs formed on Tuesday in the regions exposed to heavier precipitation. These are lying on weak layers in particular on shady slopes. Especially on very steep slopes the avalanches can be triggered in the faceted old snow. In isolated cases they are medium-sized and can be released in some cases even by a single winter sport participant, in particular at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack, when entering gullies and bowls for example on extremely steep slopes.
Some mostly small dry snow slides and avalanches are possible as a consequence of solar radiation. This applies in particular on extremely steep slopes at intermediate and high altitudes.

snowpackStructure.comment:
10 to 20 cm of snow, but less in some localities, fell on Tuesday above approximately 1200 m. Weak layers exist in the old snowpack on shady slopes. The snowpack is unfavourably layered. The new snow and wind slabs of Tuesday are lying on the unfavourable surface of an old snowpack in particular on shady slopes at intermediate and high altitudes. This snow is bonding only slowly with the old snowpack.

As a consequence of rising temperatures and solar radiation a crust formed on the surface at the weekend. At intermediate and high altitudes snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind. At low and intermediate altitudes only a little snow is now lying. The numerous rocks hidden by the recent snow are the main danger.

tendency.highlights: On Friday it will be mostly sunny.
